description: This file contains unit tests for the 'envmapper' module within the 'universalinit_env' package. It tests functions for template path handling, template file parsing, environment variable prefixing, mapping between common and framework-specific environments, and supported framework querying. The tests also cover edge cases and integration scenarios.

classes.name: TestTemplatePath
classes.description: Tests for the get_template_path function for existing and nonexistent frameworks.

classes.name: TestParseTemplateFile
classes.description: Tests for parse_template_file, covering existing, nonexistent, with prefix, without prefix, empty, invalid YAML, and invalid mapping.

classes.name: TestPrefixMapping
classes.description: Tests for apply_prefix_mapping function, applying prefix to environment variables.

classes.name: TestFrameworkMapping
classes.description: Tests for mapping between common environment and framework-specific environment variables for React.

classes.name: TestSupportedFrameworks
classes.description: Tests for get_supported_frameworks, ensuring frameworks are returned and templates exist.

classes.name: TestUnmappedVariablePreservation
classes.description: Ensures that unmapped variables are preserved during mappings both ways.

classes.name: TestEdgeCases
classes.description: Tests handling of special characters, unicode, very long values, and general robustness.

classes.name: TestIntegration
classes.description: Performs full workflow integration tests including template parsing and environment mapping.

methods.name: test_get_template_path_existing(self)
methods.description: Test get_template_path for an existing framework to confirm path exists and contains 'env.template'.

methods.name: test_get_template_path_nonexistent(self)
methods.description: Test get_template_path for a nonexistent framework to confirm it raises FileNotFoundError.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_existing(self)
methods.description: Test parsing an existing template file and verify the contents.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_nonexistent(self)
methods.description: Test parsing a nonexistent file, expecting a FileNotFoundError.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_with_prefix(self)
methods.description: Test parsing a template file with a 'prefix' key, verifying prefix and mapping.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_without_prefix(self)
methods.description: Test parsing a template file without prefix, expecting prefix to be None.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_empty(self)
methods.description: Test parsing an empty template file, expecting empty mapping and no prefix.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_invalid_yaml(self)
methods.description: Test parsing invalid YAML; expect a ValueError indicating invalid YAML.

methods.name: test_parse_template_file_invalid_mapping(self)
methods.description: Test parsing a template file with invalid mapping type, expecting a ValueError.

methods.name: test_apply_prefix_mapping(self)
methods.description: Test that apply_prefix_mapping correctly prefixes environment variable keys.

methods.name: test_apply_prefix_mapping_empty(self)
methods.description: Verify prefixing on empty environment results in empty dict.

methods.name: test_map_common_to_framework_react(self)
methods.description: Test converting common env vars to React-specific env vars with mappings and prefixes.

methods.name: test_map_framework_to_common_react(self)
methods.description: Test converting React env vars back to common env vars, maintaining data integrity.

methods.name: test_mapping_roundtrip(self)
methods.description: Ensure that mapping to framework format and reversing results in original data.

methods.name: test_mapping_with_empty_env(self)
methods.description: Test empty environment variables for both maps, expecting empty dicts.

methods.name: test_get_supported_frameworks(self)
methods.description: Verify the list of supported frameworks includes 'react' and they have valid templates.

methods.name: test_preserve_unmapped_common_variables(self)
methods.description: Check that unmapped common variables are preserved when mapped to framework.

methods.name: test_preserve_unmapped_framework_variables(self)
methods.description: Check that unmapped framework variables are preserved when mapped to common.

methods.name: test_mapping_with_special_characters(self)
methods.description: Ensure special characters are preserved through mapping conversions.

methods.name: test_mapping_with_unicode(self)
methods.description: Ensure unicode characters are preserved during mapping.

methods.name: test_mapping_with_very_long_values(self)
methods.description: Check handling of very long environment variable values.

methods.name: test_full_workflow(self)
methods.description: Integration test covering: path retrieval, template parsing, environment mapping and roundtrip validation.
